title: 6.3.3 Create TrialEnforcementMiddleware
body:
## Parent Issue
#25 - 6.3 Trial Management System

## Objective
Create middleware to enforce trial limits on metered endpoints.

## Requirements
- Map endpoints to usage dimensions
- Return 429 when limit reached
- Include upgrade URL in response

## Files to Create
- `src/cloud_optimizer/middleware/trial.py`

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Metered endpoints checked
- [ ] 429 returned at limit
- [ ] Response includes current/limit counts
- [ ] Non-metered endpoints pass through

## Estimated Time
2 hours
